message.content:
cs.IT, cs.COMM, cs.SI, cs.SP, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with a communication system (OFDM) and proposes a method that uses compressive sensing to recover a distorted signal. This falls under the domain of information theory (cs.IT) and communication (cs.COMM). The method also involves selecting reliable perturbations from a constellation lattice, which is related to signal processing (cs.SP) and machine learning (cs.LG). Finally, the paper proposes a practical solution to the problem of initial erroneous decoding decisions, which is related to system identification (cs.SI).
